Package star_wars_card_collector.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
star_wars_card_collector.controller.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api") public class UserController extends Object
Controller class that handles HTTP requests related to user operations.

  • Method Details

    • getInventoryNames

      @GetMapping("/inventory") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getInventoryNames(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Retrieves the names from the inventory of the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      authentication - The authentication object representing the authenticated user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the list of names from the inventory or error message if not found.

    • pushToInventory

      @PostMapping("/pushToInventory") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> pushToInventory(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Pushes a randomly selected Star Wars character's details to the inventory of the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      authentication - The authentication object representing the authenticated user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a success message and remaining currency or error message if not found.

    • getUserInfo

      @GetMapping("/user") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getUserInfo(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Retrieves the information of the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      authentication - The authentication object representing the authenticated user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with user information or error message if not found.

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("/user") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateUser(@RequestBody User updatedUser, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Updates the information of the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      updatedUser - The updated User object with new information.
      authentication - The authentication object representing the authenticated user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the updated user information or error message if not found.
